placeholderImages.description: A modern lecture hall with tiered seating and a large projector screen.
A fully equipped chemistry laboratory with workstations and fume hoods.
A computer lab with rows of desktops available for students.
A quiet study room within the library, suitable for small groups.
A professional conference room with a large table and video conferencing equipment.
A spacious art studio with easels, natural light, and creative supplies.
A soundproofed music room with a piano and other instruments.
A large gymnasium with a basketball court and bleachers.
